Class DefenderExplosion

java.lang.Object
  Explosion
      DefenderExplosion
public class DefenderExplosion
extends Explosion

This class represents a defender explosion, an explosion made by the player in the Missile Command game world. This type of explosion does not harm buildings.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Tobias Salem, alias Vassago

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from class Explosion
currentRadius, damage, growthSpeed, location, maxRadius
 
Constructor Summary
DefenderExplosion()
          Constructs a DefenderExplosion with its default values.
DefenderExplosion(Vector2D location, int maxRadius, int growthSpeed)
          Constructs a DefenderExplosion with a current radius of 0 centered at the Vector2D location, with the specified maximum radius (in pixels) and rate of growth (in pixels per time step).
 
Methods inherited from class Explosion
explode, getCurrentRadius, getDamage, getGrowthSpeed, getLocation, getMaxRadius, intersects, intersects, setCurrentRadius, setDamage, setGrowthSpeed, setLocation, setMaxRadius

Constructor Detail

DefenderExplosion

public DefenderExplosion()
Constructs a DefenderExplosion with its default values.

DefenderExplosion

public DefenderExplosion(Vector2D location,
                         int maxRadius,
                         int growthSpeed)
Constructs a DefenderExplosion with a current radius of 0 centered at the Vector2D location, with the specified maximum radius (in pixels) and rate of growth (in pixels per time step).

Parameters:
location - the location of the explosion
maxRadius - the maximum radius of the explosion
growthSpeed - the speed with which the explosion grows to maxRadius
